description: Sink your teeth into this delicious breakfast bagel burger that features smoky bacon, eggs and avocado. It's a pretty special way to start your day!
name: Breakfast Bagel Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread bagel bases with avocado mixture, then top with bacon, eggs and relish. Sandwich with bagel tops and serve.
